project: Onboarding Phase 3 - Child Linking & Admin Invitation Tools
description: Unified child linking modal for parents plus comprehensive invitation management dashboard for admins. Includes accept/decline per child, cross-org sharing consent, declined link handling, and bulk invitation operations.

userStories.title: Add status and declinedAt fields to guardianPlayerLinks table
userStories.description: As the system, I track whether a parent has accepted, declined, or not yet responded to a child link.
acceptanceCriteria: Verify in Convex dashboard that guardianPlayerLinks table has new fields
userStories.notes: Default status for existing links should be treated as 'active'. New links from invitation flow start as 'pending'.

userStories.title: Create child link queries and mutations
userStories.description: As the system, I can query pending child links and allow parents to accept/decline them.
acceptanceCriteria: Returns: v.array(v.object({ linkId, playerIdentityId, playerName, relationship, organizationName }))
Logic: Get guardianIdentities for user → Get links where status = 'pending' → Join with player info
Returns: v.array(v.object({ linkId, playerName, guardianName, guardianEmail, declinedAt }))
Logic: Admin view - get all declined links for org
- Verify link belongs to current user's guardianIdentity
- Verify link belongs to current user's guardianIdentity
Logic: Update all pending links for this guardianIdentity to active
Logic: Reset status to 'pending', clear declinedAt
userStories.notes: Cross-org sharing consent is stored on the link record. consentToSharing field may need to be added to schema.

userStories.title: Create ChildLinkingStep modal component
userStories.description: As a parent with pending child links, I see a modal showing all children awaiting my acknowledgement.
acceptanceCriteria: Use shadcn/ui AlertDialog (cannot be dismissed without action)
- If user previously accepted GDPR without children, show privacy extension text:
'Your privacy consent now extends to the children below'
- List of pending children as Cards:
- Checkbox: 'Allow sharing of my child's progress with coaches at other clubs'
- When all links are actioned, call onComplete
Use useMutation for acceptChildLink, declineChildLink, acceptAllChildLinks
Show toast on each action: 'Child linked successfully' or 'Link declined'
userStories.notes: Modal cannot be closed without actioning all children. Privacy extension text only shows for users with existing GDPR consent.

userStories.title: Integrate ChildLinkingStep into OnboardingOrchestrator
userStories.description: As the system, I show the child linking modal when a parent has pending links.
acceptanceCriteria: - After GDPR check, add child_linking check:
tasks.push({ type: 'child_linking', priority: 2, data: { links: pendingLinks } });
Test: Admin adds guardian with 3 children → Parent logs in → Sees modal with all 3
userStories.notes: Child linking comes AFTER GDPR consent (priority 2 vs priority 0).

userStories.title: Create invitation management page for admins
userStories.description: As an admin, I have a dedicated page to manage all invitations with tabs for different statuses.
acceptanceCriteria: Page requires admin/owner role (redirect if not authorized)
Returns: v.object({ active: v.number(), expiringSoon: v.number(), expired: v.number(), requests: v.number() })
- Each tab shows filtered invitation list
userStories.notes: Expiring Soon = invitations with expiresAt within 48 hours of now.

userStories.title: Create InvitationCard component with actions
userStories.description: As an admin, I see each invitation as a card with relevant actions based on status.
acceptanceCriteria: - Expires/Expired date with relative time ('Expires in 2 days' or 'Expired 3 days ago')
userStories.notes: Use date-fns formatDistanceToNow for relative dates.

userStories.title: Implement bulk invitation mutations
userStories.description: As an admin, I can resend or cancel multiple invitations at once.
acceptanceCriteria: Returns: v.object({ success: v.boolean(), newInvitationId: v.string() })
- Create new invitation with same details, new expiresAt
Returns: v.object({ success: v.number(), failed: v.number() })
Logic: Loop through and call resendInvitation for each
Returns: v.object({ success: v.number(), failed: v.number() })
Logic: Loop through and call cancelInvitation for each
userStories.notes: Bulk operations should handle partial failures gracefully.

userStories.title: Create invitation request queue UI
userStories.description: As an admin, I see pending invitation requests and can approve or deny them.
acceptanceCriteria: - Original organization they were invited to
- Create new invitation for the user
- Send email with new invitation link
- Optionally send email notification to requester
Test: User requests new invitation → Admin sees in Requests tab → Approve → User gets new email
userStories.notes: The Requests tab in the invitation management page renders these cards.

userStories.title: Add email checkbox to add-guardian dialog
userStories.description: As an admin adding a guardian to a player, I can choose whether to send an email notification.
acceptanceCriteria: - Description text: 'If unchecked, guardian will see prompt on next login'
Pass sendEmail boolean to the mutation that creates the guardian link
- If sendEmail !== false, trigger notification email
- If sendEmail === false, just create the pending link
Test: Add guardian with checkbox ON → Email sent
Test: Add guardian with checkbox OFF → No email, guardian sees modal on next login
userStories.notes: This gives admins flexibility for bulk imports where emails might not be desired immediately.

userStories.title: Create admin notification for declined child links
userStories.description: As an admin, I receive a notification when a parent declines a child link.
acceptanceCriteria: In declineChildLink mutation, after updating status:
Show list of declined links with 'Resend' button for each
Test: Parent declines child → Admin sees notification toast → Click leads to declined links view
userStories.notes: The notification should link to a view where admin can resend the declined link.

verificationSteps: Test: Admin adds guardian with 3 children → Parent sees modal with all 3
Test: Parent accepts 2, declines 1 → Dashboard shows 2 children → Admin sees declined badge
Test: Admin resends declined → Parent sees that child in modal again
Test: 5 invitations expire → Admin bulk re-invites → 5 new emails sent
Test: User requests new invitation → Admin approves → User gets email
successCriteria: Parent sees all pending children in one modal
Privacy extension acknowledgement shown when applicable
Can accept/decline individually or all at once
Admin sees badge when parent declines
